name: VxStream Sandbox
description: This App integrates VxStream Sandbox Service and provides actions like 'detonate_file', 'run_query', 'get_result' etc. Every action uses the 'api_key'.

base_url.description: Base URL to VxStream Sandbox Application Server

actions.description: Search for samples in VxStream Sandbox database using query string.

query.verbose: Search query - some basic parameters like hash and filename can be used directly e.g. 4d281f21a6b4dd4c0467df4ce00b1e3212fcbdeb5d906ccc545db24a93f6fb1c, but also there is support for more advanced search options. For more info, check https://www.hybrid-analysis.com/faq#advanced-search-options

actions.description: Search for similar samples by given Sha256 hash in the VxStream Sandbox database.
Search for a given IP in the VxStream Sandbox database.
Search for a file by one kind of data(Sha1, Md5, Sha256 or Filename) in the VxStream Sandbox database.
Search for a given malware family in the VxStream Sandbox database.
Search for a given domain in the VxStream Sandbox database.
Search for a given URL in the VxStream Sandbox database.
Download the pcap file of sample from VxStream Sandbox and add it to vault.
Download sample result data from VxStream Sandbox and add it to vault.
Fetch results of an already completed analysis in the VxStream Sandbox.
Check status of sample (file or URL) submitted in the VxStream Sandbox.
Detonate a URL in the VxStream Sandbox.
Detonate the file in the VxStream Sandbox.

vault_id.description: Vault ID of file to submit

file_name.verbose: This value will be passed to the VxStream Sandbox as the name of the file that is pickup up from the vault

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity.
